DOC.brief_summary: Studies investigating physiological processes involved in aging-related deficits in regulation of stress hormone systems.
DOC.brief_title: Age-Related Changes in Stress Hormone Regulation
DOC.criteria: History of major psychiatric disorders, Neurologic disorder affecting cognitive function, Unstable medical problems, Medications including antidepressants, neuroleptics, anxiolytics, CNS stimulants, narcotic analgesics, anticonvulsants, Drugs effecting HPA axis function, Vision and hearing deficits, Undergoing major life event within one month or Loss of family member within 6 months.
